Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 11 and σ = 0.3. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to be among the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 10.3951
* 10.402
* 10.6891
* 10.732

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10.3951: Incorrect
* 10.402: Incorrect
* 10.6891: Correct
* 10.732: Incorrect
